name: Flippy Board
description: Flippy Board aka Crappy Board is a 2D skateboarding endless runner where your goal is to do sick jumps over "sus" security guards and collect as many flippy points as you can until you get board. This is my submission for the GitHub GameOff 2022 Game Jam. The theme was "cliche" so I chose to make the cliche rookie solo indie game dev move and set out to make Tony Hawk Pro Skater with NFTs and ended up making a crappy, buggy Flippy Bird rip off. I think I succeeded in my goal and so if you are playing this and experience problems those are creative choices and features not Ls and bugs.
